replies.body: wish they would just make a decent looking skin for tryndamere for once like hes got 9skins and they all suck :/

To be fair to the skin team, his kit is hella boring, he has no particle effects except slightly different coloured auras for his passive and ult. 
the most interesting thing he does visually, is spin around.

Honestly, what do you expect them to be able to do?

He will probably never have a skin as good as PROJECT: Ashe or Pulsefire Cait, purely because he is just less of a champion.
Like literally, all Trynd is, is a model, he has nothing else to change. 
It's sad, but what can you do? add skilllshots?
yeah Nah ill be banning Tryn 100 percent now
I think it looks awesome! That steroid booster shot turns the man to a **Beast**!

you give someone with so many skins another skin :/ 
{{champion:83}} ?
good thing they're making skins for the overpowered champs :/
